Posts.Content: Ok I need to off load as I'm so peed off SORRY if any of this sounds selfish.Â  Pre op this morning for my lumpectomy and node removal on the 1 St .....All good under weight but very healthy pmsl.....phone call 10 minutes ago your op is being moved due to industrial action what the xxxx do they not think my head is screwed up enough can't they move someone's tonsillectomy and just cut this shit out I'm ready to scream....lost it with the woman on the phone.....Thank god my daughter was there to talk to her.....I know how you feel...well that was it the trigger no you don't so pls don't patronise me.....at least I said pls. I was pretty much together still at work focused on next Monday know I feel lost don't know if I'm coming or going HELP .
Posts.Title: strike action REALLY

Posts.Content: Hi well got my results and I'm unluckly lucky grade one 8mm so lumpectomy and node removal on the 1 st December.....had a few tears.....then went into auto pilot mode just get on with it not sure how I'm suppose to feel?? People say your so strong no I'm practical and have a job to do....beat this crap......
Posts.Title: Grade 1
